name: Jerry Wu

services.title: Data Cleaning
services.description: Process huge data sets and clean variables into desired formats for analysis

services.title: Data Visualization
services.description: Present key messages of data using the most appropriate and direct visualizations

services.title: Data Modelling
services.description: Analysis underlying data patterns using models such as linear regression, general additive models, and machine learning.

services.title: Computer Programming
services.description: Automate data ETL and analysis processes to maximize work efficiency

aboutpara:
I recently graduated from the University of Toronto in May 2023 with a double major in Statistics and Economics, focusing on Data Analytics, and a minor in Computer Science. As a data enthusiast, I am captivated by the immense value that data holds. I enjoy working with large datasets, extracting key metrics, and presenting them through visually appealing visualizations. I am currently seeking job or project opportunities in the field of data analysis or data science.
Some of my past projects are described in the Blog section.

education.universityPara: Double Majors in Economics and Economics (Focus in Data Analytics), Minor in Computer Science

experiences.position: Research Assistant at University of Toronto
experiences.bullets: Assisted Professor Meredith Franklin in her environmental and statistical researches,, Provided programming assistance using R to perform data cleaning/visualization/modelling.

experiences.position: Teaching Assistant at University of Toronto
experiences.bullets: Teaching Assistant for first year statistics course: An Introduction to Statistical Reasoning and Data Science,, Lead weekly in-person tutorials for ~23 students, engage in discussions, review weekly content, and motivate students to learn statistics,, Evaluate and provide feedback on student works, including problem sets, writings, presentations, and tests,, Host office hours to answer student answers

Developed and implemented a robust fund fact sheet parser using Python and REGEX to extract critical information from PDF, TXT, and XML files stored on AWS S3. Designed the solution to be flexible and easily extendable for future variations,, Actively participated in collaborative data quality assurance efforts, working closely with colleagues to identify, report, and resolve issues. Utilized a range of tools including DBeaver, GitHub, and Excel to ensure data accuracy,, Wrote SQL scripts on Zeppelin, Redash, and DBeaver for adâ€‘hoc data requests and QA tasks, utilizing PostgreSQL, MySQL.

Actively engaged in client meetings, contributing to the identification and documentation of key business components,, Played a crucial role in translating, merging, and refining introductory presentations on Automated Digital Process Mining.

experiences.position: Big Data and AI Engineer at IBM
experiences.bullets: Conducted extensive research and analysis to compare big data tools, presenting recommendations to the client,, Developed presentations and procedure manuals for a recommender system framework tailored to automotive.
